content: The electricity market in Great Britain has a wealth of available information available from Elexon, the market operator. Prior to the creation of a new API system in 2016 this data was challenging to access. I have been working to download and process the old files that have not been migrated to the new system. The full archive spans back to as early as 2002 and offers an invaluable dataset for researchers. The goal is to make this data available in a lightweight and easy-to-use format.
summary: Open data repository of historical data on the UK electricity market
title: Balancing Mechanism Data Archive

content: This is an ongoing project to develop a high spatial resolution global GIS dataset of electricity consumption. An alpha version of the dataset has been completed. Work to get a final publishable version is ongoing.
summary: High spatial resolution GIS dataset of electricity consumption
title: Global Gridded Electricity dataset
Choosing between environmental ills: a study of the phase-out of nuclear power in Germany
Global Gridded Electricity: a high spatial resolution dataset of world electricity consumption
Resource acquisition, distribution and end-use efficiencies and the growth of industrial society
Does environmental regulation spur innovation? A study of acid rain regulation and the power sector in the UK, 1960-1990
